Please note that if you use this application, you are bound to this license. ******************************************************************************** COLDBOX DASHBOARD LITE EDITION INSTALLATION ******************************************************************************** Please place the dashboard folder in your coldbox folder in your web root. You can also place the dashboard in any location of your web root if needed. The first method is the default one. The dashboard requires that ColdBox be installed in the default location of the webroot as it is also a ColdBox Application. However, if you have refactored the ColdBox framework to your custom needs, you will need to alter some configuration in order for the Dashboard application to work: 1) index.cfm - Alter the location of the coldbox.cfm file Example if /frameworks/coldbox_2 is the new location <cfinclude template="/frameworks/coldbox_2/coldbox/system/coldbox.cfm"> 2) config.xml.cfm - Alter the coldbox_location setting to point to the coldbox system folder. DO NOT APPEND A / AT THE END. Example: /frameworks/coldbox_2 is the new location <Setting name="Coldbox_Location" value="/frameworks/coldbox_2/coldbox/system"/> 3) Open the handlers/baseHandler.cfc and change the extends to match your installation. 4)You can also alter any of the settings on the config.xml.cfm to meet your needs such as: 1) OwnerEmail 2) BugTracerReports 3) MailServerSettings 4) ReinitPassword 5) DebugPassword Then reach it by going to the following address if in the default location: http://localhost/coldbox/dashboard The default password is coldbox ******************************************************************************** SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS ******************************************************************************** - ColdFusion MX 6.X and above - BlueDragon 6.X and above - Railo 2.0 and above - Application Scope for the Frameworks internal structures - Session Scope for messaging. ******************************************************************************** CHANGELOG ******************************************************************************** Version 2.0.0 - Update to the 2.0 ColdBox framework - Moved to JQuery Version 2.1.0 - #1 Domain Model refactoring - #2 Addition of Framework Conventions - #3 Application Generator Version 2.2.0 - Railo/BD Enhacned Support - ColdBox Path can be now changed. - Base Event handler for customization, not compiled. - App Generator updates, does now test suites and more. - Cleanup and optimization.
